title: Macadamia + Coconut Muffins with Coconut Butter
directions: Preheat oven to 175ºC / 350ºF. Combine almond meal, baking powder, salt and shredded coconut in a bowl. In a second bowl, combine coconut oil, coconut cream, eggs (add one at a time mixing after each one), then combine the wet and dry ingredients. Add the macadamia nuts and mix well. Spoon into muffin cups and bake for 12 – 15 minutes. Serve warm with coconut butter.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons baking powder (use gluten free if you prefer).
